

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(igraph)
library(tidygraph)
library(ggraph)
library(mdsr)

Teammates <- read.csv("data/lebron_teammates.csv")

Teammates_50 <- Teammates |>
  head(50)

Teammates_100 <- Teammates |>
  head(100)

Teammates_50_Network <- Teammates_50 |>
  as_tbl_graph(directed=FALSE) |>
  activate(nodes)

Teammates_100_Network <- Teammates_100 |>
  as_tbl_graph(directed=FALSE) |>
  activate(nodes)

Teammates_Network <- Teammates |>
  as_tbl_graph(directed=FALSE) |>
  activate(nodes)

Teammates_50_Filter <- Teammates_50_Network |> 
  activate(nodes) |> 
  filter(total %in% GP) 

Teammates_50_Filter <- Teammates_50_Filter |>
  mutate(in_degree = strength(Teammates_50_Filter, mode = "in"))


```
